EmailTemplate.subject: Solar at {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I am writing to see if {!Account.Name} has considered going solar? It's a great investment with attractive and stable economic returns, and there’s a lot of positive PR that comes with a solar facility.
I work for Borrego Solar, a California based company that finances and builds commercial solar systems for California agricultural customers. We capitalize, design, install, operate and maintain the solar system at your facility with no up-front cost and no financial risk. You simply purchase clean, renewable solar power from us at a discount to what you currently pay for electricity. If a purchase or lease is more appealing, we do that as well. With most California food processing customers, we are seeing a 15-20% IRR with 4-6 year paybacks.
For 30 years, Borrego Solar has been working to help customers go solar and we've built more than 46MW to date. Some of our recent CA customers include:
+ San Diego County Water Authority + Padre Dam Municipal Water District + City of Ridgecrest + Madera Community Hospital + Santa Clara County + Zone 7 Water District + Vista Irrigation District
If you’ve thought about solar, or you are interested in learning more, please do one of the following:
1) Hit reply and send me a brief note. I will follow up with a call at your convenience; 2) Call me directly on my mobile at 415-378-5885; or, 3) Forward this to a colleague or staff member who has been thinking about this issue.
In five minutes, I can tell you more about our program and see if there might be an economic advantage to your going solar. {!Contact.FirstName}, thanks for your time. Borrego Solar has been working with customers like you for more than 30 years, and I hope we'll have the opportunity to get together soon. Best regards,
Steve Birndorf
Office: 510-496-8701 Mobile: 415-378-5885 Email: sbirndorf@borregosolar.com Web: http://www.borregosolar.com
